_aChangeLog.text: Nerfed last boss of stage 4 hp.
Fixed few teleport that were to fast

_aLatestUpdates._sText: I believe this is the final version for a while :<

_aChangeLog.text: Fixed stage 2 bossfight zm platform attack that were killed permanently
Fixed stage 4 second miniboss, people cannot shoot from outside now
Changed a bit one of the surf ramp on stage 4 that was to much..
Changed a bit kz triggers on stage 4, added extra units.. made it easier
The two last boss on stages 4 now add hp correctly
Tried to make the ending dodge less laggy..

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
I believe v4 is the final and stable version for a while.

I also should have named the map as "v1_1, v1_2". But its kinda late.

_sText:
Hey,Â 

Here is my second zombie escape map.

ze_minimal is based on kz_bhop_minimal, a map I made around 2 years ago.
The lightning, textures and the atmosphere is really similar.
I added a bit of kz triggers but didnt want to force the map to be "ze_kz". So its actually doable if you have correct movements skill.

The map have 4 stages.

Stage 1, Cyan.
Stage 2, Green.
Stage 3, Purple.
Stage 4, Blue.

There is 12 items in total. 6 for humans and 6 for zombies. All items are unlocked on stage 4.
The map is kinda challenging and need good teamplay.

If you have any suggestion on how the map can be improve or any report you can send me a message on discord (m4dara#9181).

Special thanks to Unloze and Nide that allow me to test beta version on their public server.

Special thanks to Moltard for the global help around hammer.

Good luck and have fun!
